text:
SANTA MONICA, Calif. -- The second annual 2018 NBA Awards presented by Kia aired live on TNT from Barker Hanger in Santa Monica, Calif. featuring the traditional season-ending awards plus new categories, all determined exclusively by fan voting.

Below is a complete list of winners:

[WINNER] Dwane Casey, Toronto Raptors

Quin Snyder, Utah Jazz

Brad Stevens, Boston Celtics

Voting Totals (PDF)



NBA Basketball Executive of the Year

[WINNER] Daryl Morey, Houston Rockets | Voting Totals (PDF)



NBA Sportsmanship Award

[WINNER] Kemba Walker, Charlotte Hornets | Voting Totals (PDF)

[WINNER] Dikembe Mutombo

Official release

[WINNER] Oscar Robertson

Official release

[WINNER] Jamal Crawford, Minnesota Timberwolves | Voting Totals (PDF)

[WINNER] Kevin Durant, Golden State Warriors

[WINNER] Clutch Shot of the Year -- Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James

Clutch Shot of the Year -- Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James Dunk of the Year -- Milwaukee Bucks' Giannis Antetokounmpo

Assist of the Year -- Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James

Block of the Year -- New Orleans Pelicans' Anthony Davis

Handler of the Year -- Boston Celtics' Kyrie Irving

[WINNER] Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James

Cleveland Cavaliers' Minnesota Timberwolves' Andrew Wiggins

Portland Trail Blazers' Damian Lillard

Boston Celtics' Terry Rozier

Phoenix Suns' Devin Booker

[WINNER] Milwaukee Bucks' Giannis Antetokounmpo

Milwaukee Bucks' Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James

Toronto Raptors' DeMar DeRozan

Los Angeles Lakers' Larry Nance

Utah Jazz's Donovan Mitchell

[WINNER] New Orleans Pelicans' Anthony Davis

New Orleans Pelicans' New York Knicks' Kristaps Porzingis

Milwaukee Bucks' Giannis Antetokounmpo

Miami Heat's Bam Adebayo

Phoenix Suns' Marquese Chriss

[WINNER] Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James

Cleveland Cavaliers' San Antonio Spurs' Kyle Anderson

LA Clippers' Milos Teodosic

Milwaukee Bucks' Giannis Antetokounmpo

Philadelphia 76ers' Ben Simmons

[WINNER] Boston Celtics' Kyrie Irving

Boston Celtics' Houston Rockets' James Harden

Charlotte Hornets' Kemba Walker

Phoenix Suns' Josh Jackson

Houston Rockets' Chris Paul

[WINNER] Oklahoma City's Russell Westbrook

Oklahoma City's Los Angeles Lakers' Kyle Kuzma

Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James

Houston Rockets' James Harden

Golden State Warriors' Nick Young



Hustle Award

[WINNER] Amir Johnson, Philadelphia 76ers

NBA.com/Stats: Johnson does the dirty work



All-NBA First Team

Anthony Davis, Pelicans

Kevin Durant, Warriors

James Harden, Rockets

LeBron James, Cavaliers

Damian Lillard, Blazers

Official release



NBA All-Rookie Team

Kyle Kuzma, Lakers

Lauri Markkanen, Bulls

Donovan Mitchell, Jazz

Ben Simmons, 76ers

Jayson Tatum, Celtics

Official release



NBA All-Defensive Team

Rudy Gobert, Jazz

Anthony Davis, Pelicans

Victor Oladipo, Pacers

Jrue Holiday, Pelicans

Robert Covington, 76ers

Official release



* * *

Complete voting results for each award are available at pr.nba.com.
